original_text: I had to teach you things that were easy to understand, like a mother gives milk to a baby. You were not yet ready to receive proper food. And you are still not ready to receive God's complete message!
korean_text: 내가 너희를 젖으로 먹이고 밥으로 아니하였노니 이는 너희가 감당하지 못하였음이거니와 지금도 못하리라

sentences.original_text: I had to teach you things
like a mother gives milk to a baby
sentences.korean_translation: 어머니가 아기에게 젖을 주는 것 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: And you are still not ready

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 온전한 말씀을 받을 준비가 말입니다!
